New Records: Machado tied with Colbert as the Padres' all-time home run leader
Key Match Events: Machado launched two home runs in the game
San Diego bullpen nailed down the final three frames with ease
Post-Match Reflections: Machado expressed pride in being part of the Padres' history
Padres extended their lead for the top National League Wild Card spot
Miscellaneous Highlights: Machado is hitting.304 with 19 homers since June 19
Merrill fouled a ball off his left knee in the sixth inning
